channel.title: Battlescape 317
channel.description:
100% Credit To Palidino76
You'll have to remove the mySQL yourself, not hard.
You HAVE TO download the image packer, compile it, run it, and then move the file it creates to your cache folder or else alot of images won't load.
[U]Server:[/U] EDIT: SQL disabled and passwords are loaded from the char files. EDIT2: Did the T2 fix below [url=http://uppit.com/v/uz74pvwv]http://uppit.com/v/uz74pvwv[/url] [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/9371243/cc99f3ff/317_server.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/9371243/cc99f3ff/317_server.html[/url]
[U]Client:[/U] EDIT: Disabled cache downloading, included a run.bat EDIT 2: Did the T2 fix below, enabled clipping, and set the ip to your own [url=http://uppit.com/v/YT7BMLF6]http://uppit.com/v/YT7BMLF6[/url] [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/9371204/3691a358/BS_SRC_Client.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/9371204/3691a358/BS_SRC_Client.html[/url]
[U] Cache:[/U] c:/Battlescape/V1/ -> cache files inside there [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=20Y2WIF4]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=20Y2WIF4[/url] [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/9364489/8ecaf0dd/V1_online.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/9364489/8ecaf0dd/V1_online.html[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/L6U7J4P8]http://uppit.com/v/L6U7J4P8[/url]
[U][SIZE="4"]Tools[/SIZE][/U] [U]Music Packer:[/U] Use this to save an mp3 file for use with the client. [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/9363750/dd29b0d4/Music_Packer.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/9363750/dd29b0d4/Music_Packer.html[/url]
[U]Version Writer:[/U] Used to write the current file versions of the mp3 file, sprite archive, etc [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/9363782/8689afb5/Version_Writer.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/9363782/8689afb5/Version_Writer.html[/url]
[U]Image Packer:[/U] Packs images for the cache. [url=http://uppit.com/v/APYRX7U6]http://uppit.com/v/APYRX7U6[/url]
[U][SIZE="4"]T2 Fix:[/SIZE][/U] While this doesn't hit the heart of the T2 error, this will prevent you from being logged out or the client crashing. [U]Server edits:[/U] Cryption -> getNextKey (replace the old method) [code] public int getNextKey() { return 0; } [/code]
[U]Client edits:[/U] ISAACRandomGen - > getNextKey (replace the old method) [code] public int getNextKey() { return 0; } [/code]
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2009, 04:24:44 am[/size][hr]Palidino76 Said I could Post Aslong as he gets all credit

item.title: Battlescape 317
item.dc:creator: @Wildy_Virus Wildy Virus
item.description:
@Wildy_Virus wrote:

100% Credit To Palidino76

You’ll have to remove the mySQL yourself, not hard.

You HAVE TO download the image packer, compile it, run it, and then move the file it creates to your cache folder or else alot of images won’t load.

Server:
EDIT: SQL disabled and passwords are loaded from the char files.
EDIT2: Did the T2 fix below
http://uppit.com/v/uz74pvwv
http://www.2shared.com/file/9371243/cc99f3ff/317_server.html

Client:
EDIT: Disabled cache downloading, included a run.bat
EDIT 2: Did the T2 fix below, enabled clipping, and set the ip to your own
http://uppit.com/v/YT7BMLF6
http://www.2shared.com/file/9371204/3691a358/BS_SRC_Client.html


Cache:
c:/Battlescape/V1/ -> cache files inside there
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=20Y2WIF4
http://www.2shared.com/file/9364489/8ecaf0dd/V1_online.html
http://uppit.com/v/L6U7J4P8

[SIZE=“4”]Tools[/SIZE]
Music Packer:
Use this to save an mp3 file for use with the client.
http://www.2shared.com/file/9363750/dd29b0d4/Music_Packer.html

Version Writer:
Used to write the current file versions of the mp3 file, sprite archive, etc
http://www.2shared.com/file/9363782/8689afb5/Version_Writer.html

Image Packer:
Packs images for the cache.
http://uppit.com/v/APYRX7U6

[SIZE=“4”]T2 Fix:[/SIZE]
While this doesn’t hit the heart of the T2 error, this will prevent you from being logged out or the client crashing.
Server edits:
Cryption -> getNextKey (replace the old method)

    public int getNextKey()
    {
        return 0;
    }

Client edits:
ISAACRandomGen - > getNextKey (replace the old method)

    public int getNextKey()
    {
        return 0;
    }

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2009, 04:24:44 am[/size][hr]Palidino76 Said I could Post Aslong as he gets all credit

Read full topic
